text: wima kan allah lydll qwmana baed 'an mann ealayhim bialhidayat waltawfiq hataa ybyin lahum maa yataqunah biha, wama yahtajun 'iilayh fi 'usul aldiyn wafurueiha. 'iina allah bikuli shay' ealayman, faqad ellamkm maa lam takunuu taelamuna, wbyan lakum maa bih tantafieuna, wa'aqam alhujat ealaykum bi'iiblaghikum rasalataha
